title: The Addams Family animated film lands a sequel just days after it become a box-office success
text:
They're creepy and they're kooky, mysterious and spooky, and getting a sequel in 2021.

On Monday, it was announced that The Addams Family 2 is officially in the works. MGM/UAR shares its plans for the the follow-up with an anticipated release date of October 22, 2021 according to Deadline.

The animated movie did better than expected over the weekend as it pulled in $35 million, beating out Will Smith's new movie Gemini Man at $23 million.

Creepy family! On Monday, it was announced that The Addams Family 2 is officially in the works

Here they come! MGM/UAR announced its plans for the the follow-up to the movie that was just released over the weekend with an anticipated release date of October 22, 2021

MGM obtained The Addams Family characters after two of the company's producers snagged the film rights from the Charles Addams estate.

Addams passed away back in 1988 and was a cartoonist and created Chas Addams as well as other characters who later became known as the mysterious family.

His estate which is headed by Kevin Miserocchi always wanted to do an animated film and MGM made that wish come true.

The family: Finn Wolfhard, Nick Kroll, Charlize Theron, Chloe Grace Moretz, and Snoop Dogg all smile for a photo at the premiere of the movie last week

The movie drew out some A-list celebrity names to play the famous family including: Charlize Theron as Morticia, Oscar Isaac as Gomez, Chloe Grace Moretz as Wednesday, Finn Wolfhard as Pugsley, Nick Kroll as Uncle Fester, and Snoop Dogg as It.

The first film did well in theaters on its opening weekend thanks to Columbus Day.

The majority of schools being out for the holiday.

Looking good: Charlize Theron poses with her thumb cast ahead of the premiere

Wednesday Addams: Chloe Grace Moretz poses at the premiere of The Ddams Family at Westfield Century City on October 6

The new animated flick follows the family who are surprised when they are visited by their even spookier family members.

But, they are soon swooped into a mountain of trouble when TV personality Margaux Needler wants to sell all the houses in the neighborhood but can't due to the Addams Family's mansion.

The Halloween thriller is in theaters now.
description:
On Monday, it was announced that The Addams Family 2 is officially in the works.
MGM/UAR announced its plans for the the follow-up to the movie that was just released.
